comments:
"Refresh test methods from code" button in the JUnit test editor throws an 
exception.

When using the "Refresh test methods from code" button in the JUnit test 
editor  (workaround provided in https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?
id=109668) on the test suites in test-
results/platform/org.eclipse.hyades.logging.core.tests, the following exception 
is thrown:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-10-23 13:19:02.69
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception

Fixed.
This was caused by a handle leak in
org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.editor.form.util.NamedElementLink.
